titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the convocation of the Bishops and clergy of the province of Canterbury at Westminster, Novemb. the 18th, 1689 by William Beveridge ; printed in Latin by the Bishops command ; made English by J.G.
titleStmt.author: Beveridge, William, 1637-1708.
J. G., member of the Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for N.R. and J. Bullord,

notesStmt.note: Half title: Dr. Beveridge's sermon before the convocation english'd.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
